definitions.definition: A sheep that has been shorn for the first time
A sheepskin or lambskin that has gone through a limited shearing process so that the fibers are of uniform depth
examples: Her coat was lined with shearling.

main_definition: A sheep that has been shorn for the first time
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly US ) A sheepskin or lambskin that has gone through a limited shearing process so that the fibers are of uniform depth
